actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend for 2 years a transitional rule under which certain charitable remainder trusts may be amended or modified to conform to the strict requirements of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.

summary.text: Extends for two years the transitional rule under which specified charitable remainder trusts must be amended or modified to conform to the strict requirements of the Tax Reform Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 2 years a transitional rule under which certain charitable remainder trusts may be amended or modified to conform to the strict requirements of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.
